normal.1: Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward slash.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Creates a Lumidouce Case that deals <dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</dendro>.
4: Fires of Puffs of Puredew at nearby opponents at intervals, dealing <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro>.

If nearby opponents are Burning, they will give off Scents at intervals. The Lumidouce Case will collect these nearby scents, and after gathering 2, it will level up, firing 1 extra Puff of Puredew for every Puff that would be fired off, while the DMG dealt by such attacks will also be increased.
1 Lumidouce Case created by Emilie herself can exist at any one time. The Case starts at Level 1 and can go up to Level 2.
description.7: At intervals, after Emilie creates a Lumidouce Case this way, a Spiritbreath Thorn will descend in front of her and pierce her opponent, dealing Pneuma-aligned <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro>.
description.9: "The world is an endless harmony of fragrance, color, and song."

description.0: Guiding the fragrances collected within the Case, Emilie converts them into pure Dendro energy, creating a Level 3 Lumidouce Case and destroying existing Cases.
description.1: While it exists, the Level 3 Lumidouce Case will not gather nearby Scents, but it will continuously cause Scented Dew to descend, attacking opponents within range and dealing <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro>. During this time, 1 drop of Scented Dew will descend every 0.3 second(s), and 1 opponent can become the target every 0.7 second(s).
description.2: When the duration ends, a Level 1 Lumidouce Case will be recreated. If a Lumidouce Case that had already collected Scents was destroyed when Aromatic Explication was used, the newly created Lumidouce Case will inherit the previous Scents and Level of the destroyed Case.
description.3: While Aromatic Explication is active, the Elemental Skill "Fragrance Extraction" will not create a Lumidouce Case.
description.5: <i>No matter the perfume, it will begin to change the instant it comes into contact with the air, before finally dissipating amidst the whispers of wind, trees, and grass. In that sense, no two people will appreciate the exact same fragrance.
description.6: So it is for the paths taken by all who live. In that sense, you can consider perfumes an explication of human life.

description.0: Each time it collects 2 Scents, the Level 2 Lumidouce Case will consume Scents and release Cleardew Cologne that deals 500% of Emilie's ATK as AoE Dendro DMG to opponents. This DMG is not considered Elemental Skill DMG.
description.1: Emilie cannot trigger this effect for 30s after triggering Catalyze or Spread.

description.0: When a Lumidouce Case created by Emilie is on the field, all party members gain 85% <pyro>Pyro RES</pyro> against Burning DMG.
Increases the DMG dealt by Fragrance Extraction and the Cleardew Cologne from the Passive Talent "Lingering Fragrance" by 10%. The latter requires unlocking said Passive Talent first.
description.1: Additionally, when nearby party members trigger the Burning reaction on opponents or deal Dendro DMG to Burning opponents, they will generate an additional Scent. This effect can be triggered once every 2.9s.

description.0: When the Lumidouce Case created by Emilie collects Scents, Emilie will gain 1 Special Blend stack, which will increase her ATK by 18% for 10s. Max 2 stacks, each stack is counted independently.
Increases the Level of Fragrance Extraction by 3.
Aromatic Explication's duration is increased by 2s. The interval between selecting an opponent as the target for Scented Dew is decreased by 0.3s.
Increases the Level of Aromatic Explication by 3.
When using Fragrance Extraction or Aromatic Explication, Emilie will gain Abiding Fragrance for 5s.
description.1: While this is active, after Emilie uses Normal or Charged Attacks, she will generate 1 Scent, and her Normal and Charged Attacks will be converted into <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro> that cannot be overridden, and their DMG will be increased by 250% of Emilie's ATK.
description.3: Abiding Fragrance's effects will be canceled after 4 Scents are created, or after the duration expires. Abiding Fragrance can be triggered once every 12s.
